answers.answer: the end??? ugh!  I'm about 10 weeks & already horrible!Actually, I do remember just so uncomfortable at the end with my daughter.  You cant sleep, you have all KINDS of pain, When you do finally fall asleep you wake up & have to pee!  Felt like someone was pushing on my ribs (duh, my daughter)I was prob HORRIBLE to be around.  Time is going slow isn't it?

Lol yess! My first was a breeze my second was actually super easy until the delivery i guess its true about boys being more trouble. Probably doesnt help that i have two toddlers to try to keep up with! Im 35 weeks and they are talking about induction in a week or two but i really wanted a natrual birth but im getting so miserable i dont really care at this point lol!

I had a horrible time with my daughter.  I had every symptom in the book!  Nausea, itching, back pains, sciatic nerve pain (which was the worst!)  I ended up with preeclampsia.  I went from 115 lbs to 180 lbs.  Most of it was water retention. I could not bend my knees or my fingers due to swelling.  I was in the hospital on bedrest the last month & ended up having a c-section at 37 weeks.  I had already lost over 40 lbs by the time I went home after delivery!  Sooo much water.I'm hoping this time it is easy on me.  especially since I have a 5 yr old, who I don't want to leave while I'm in the hospital.Hopre time speeds up for you!

Lately Ive noticed Im crying every day for no reason AT ALL. I cry when I get hot or when I'm starving even. I cry when I see a supermodel on TV, especially if my husbands in the room. I feel ike a giant cow with these huge utters that are always in my way. I just cant help it when i cry :(. Ahh. I'm always sweating too It just started snowing and Ive been keeping my windows open a little at night still because I'm so damn hot. I cant sleep EVER anymore. Especially with this virus I have! I wake up LITERALLY every hour and pee or just from turning over and then once I'm awake it takes AT LEAST 40 min or so to go back to sleep. I cant take Unisom every single night because I take it like every few days and I know that cant be good right? My damn dog need to go pee at 7 30 on the dot every day and its freezing out tehre in the morning. And all I want is pop and coffee. and I cant have it. :(Ah, the joys of pregnancy.
Lol you can have a pop i promise;)! I still havrone a day which my ob said is fine. Seriously what is with the hottness? Im warm allll the time which is weird for me! Grrrr.....

lol :) I have a pop every day. I just LOVE it with my meals and I want wayy too much of it, it always sounds good! and thank God my husband likes it cold in the room too or we'd be having a problem at night lol.
Lol! If i had it my way id have all the windows open buut i have two toddlers so i cant dress them in there snowsuits inside even tho im tempted to lol..

The hormones are the worst. I am 37 weeks tomorrow and so moody at times and hate it! I seem to get very annoyed and sometimes mad with my kids over the littlest things which I feel horrible for right after. I can't wait to have this baby so I'm not so crazy!!
Likewise! Now the lovely insomnia has kicked in!!

Yes, I am.I am sooooooo annoyed at my OH... Gr! LOL!!!! well, i am annoyed at everything, just take it out on him, my paranoia has got worse too haha, but he keeps saying,its your hormones so i'll ignore it.... so I say, Can I just ignore you?? haha.I dont have Insomnia yet though haha...Whoop!!x

question: Has anyone else noticed towards the end of their pregnamcy that they are increasingly moody? I have a lot going on lately but i still cant understand why im so moody! Sometimes i feel so crabby i cant stand being around myself.. Im constantly hot there os a snow storm going on right now and id like to lay on the snow in a bathing suit lol. I cry over the smallllest things.. And find i have zero patience w my kids ( which i feel terrible about). I know preg alone makes you moody but lately i just want to give up crawl in a hole until its time for baby. Sorry to whine so much lately but i cant help it!! I dont remember thos w my last two but my last two were a breeze compared to this one! Uuuugggghhhhhhhhhh!!!!!
title: Hormones end of pregnancy- RANT
